Bucks County
NEWTOWN >> Colin Wisniewski, a junior at Saint Joseph’s Preparatory High School in Philadelphia, advanced to the rank of Eagle Scout during a Court of Honor held at Olde Saint Andrew Church on April 3.

Family, friends, Scouts and leaders from Troop 29, along with Congressman Brian Fitzpatrick, State Senator Steve Santarsiero and State Rep. Perry Warren joined Colin in celebrating his major accomplishment.
